name: E-Commerce Mark
what_you_do: I'm the founder and President of 2BigFeet, where we make and sell large-size-shoes for guys with big feet. We started Michael Ellis Footwear and manufacture the biggest shoes available anywhere in the world. I'm also the founding partner of CORE Marketing Group, a marketing agency that helps businesses grow and scale.
business_focus: Founder and president of companies that make and sell large shoes, and a marketing agency that helps businesses grow and scale.
